channel.title: Why is America run by ancient white men?
channel.description:
While the president himself is not that ancient, Biden is. Most politicians are over 40, and in most cases, over 50. Bush and Cheney were ancient, Kerry was ancient, etc. Why is there a limit on the minimum age you can be to be POTUS? Is it because they want the running candidates to be apathetic to the populations desires? Its well known that as you get older, your senses are dulled. So why is there a minimum age limit?
If anything, there should be a maximum age limit. No one over 40 should be allowed in office. I want young people in the House and the Senate, not some sleazy white guys who only care about there next pay check. I'm tired of seeing old men with graying hair running our country. This is America, land of the free, not America land of the drooping grandpa's.
I think that people over 40 should not be allowed in the House, the Senate, or the White House.
Thoughts?
I apologise for my increase in threads in this section, I just enjoy reading and listening to those whom respond.

item.title: Why is America run by ancient white men?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:451183”]That’s the issue Spades. It SHOULD NOT cost millions to become a political figure. Have we all forgotten the 1700/1800’s?

Abraham Lincoln, was dirt poor, he became President.
Andrew Jackson, was dirt poor, he became President
George Washington, while not entirely poor wasn’t considered “wealthy” either, he became President

The middle class never get a chance. It’s bad enough that our votes don’t really mean much. It’s the electoral votes that really matter. And who controls those? The rich.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Why is America run by ancient white men?

item.title: Why is America run by ancient white men?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:28, topic:451183”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=554069.msg4059561#msg4059561 date=1343314477]
Ah but you misunderstand what I am getting at. They are brought up learning to do whatever it takes to get the green.

Do they get bought? obviously… why else would big business get tax break? why else would these car companies get bailed out? etc etc. All I am saying is we have to go further back than the buying out.
[/quote]

When you don’t pay your mortgage, the bank takes your house.

But when the bank loses your money (by lending it to people who can’t pay it back), they just get all of your money back with your tax money.

It’s all like one big scam too good to be true. They truly do buy out the politicians. Wouldn’t it be nice, being able to gamble as much as you want, and if you lose just have the taxpayers pick up the tab (edit: and then as CEO give yourself a 30 million dollar pay raise with taxpayer money)[/quote]
Which is why the shit almost hit the fan about 4 years ago. They got in way over their head being too greedy.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is America run by ancient white men?

Do they get bought? obviously… why else would big business get tax break? why else would these car companies get bailed out? etc etc. All I am saying is we have to go further back than the buying out.

When you don’t pay your mortgage, the bank takes your house.

But when the bank loses your money (by lending it to people who can’t pay it back), they just get all of your money back with your tax money.

It’s all like one big scam too good to be true. They truly do buy out the politicians. Wouldn’t it be nice, being able to gamble as much as you want, and if you lose just have the taxpayers pick up the tab (edit: and then as CEO give yourself a 30 million dollar pay raise with taxpayer money)
[/quote]you should never put more than $100k in a bank account cause it won’t be covered by the FDIC <3[/quote]
I can :P, $330.000 each client each bank would be covered.
The issue here is that the tax payers have to pay for the banks that fails in US.

jme: That is the nice thing by government owned banks. They can lend out governmental money directly, without any middle man trying to take their share. And they need to do well, since they would get the all cost if something goes wrong.

item.title: Why is America run by ancient white men?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:7, topic:451183”]http://usgovinfo.about.com/od/thepresidentandcabinet/a/presrequire.htm

You need to be at least 35 years old to become President of the United States.

They seem old because they have been around politics for quite some time, you can look back in the 90’s of Obama giving speeches. Not like they came out of nowhere and decided one day “I want to be President” They worked for it, and it takes years to build into that. Not to mention it costs millions to even get your name out there of your candidacy.

wiseGEEK

What are the Requirements to Run for President in the United States?

A person must be a US citizen who is at least 35 years old to run for president. Additionally, those who run for president usually...


/thread

item.title: Why is America run by ancient white men?
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:20, topic:451183”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=554069.msg4059564#msg4059564 date=1343314823]

Why do other countries judge so much, just worry about yourselves.

Because we have very few problems. We are constantly considered as the best country to live in since we took the title from Canada, we have the world’s biggest budget surplus, we are considered the most democratic state, and we share the title of having the freest press (Along with Finland). Give me a reason to worry about Norway in the near future (Yes, I was not speaking of US), and I will stop worrying about US.
[/quote]But what the United States does and doesn’t do most likely won’t affect you at all.[/quote]
You are wrong, you can see united states all over the world.

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:21, topic:451183”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=554069.msg4060397#msg4060397 date=1343359967]

Why do other countries judge so much, just worry about yourselves.

Because we have very few problems. We are constantly considered as the best country to live in since we took the title from Canada, we have the world’s biggest budget surplus, we are considered the most democratic state, and we share the title of having the freest press (Along with Finland). Give me a reason to worry about Norway in the near future (Yes, I was not speaking of US), and I will stop worrying about US.
[/quote]But what the United States does and doesn’t do most likely won’t affect you at all.

Should we only think about ourselves?[/quote]

Of course not, after all we all are on the same planet.

item.title: Why is America run by ancient white men?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

That’s the one major flaw with our (The United State’s) governing system. It relies on the fact that good people will do the right thing. With a population more seemingly interested in wealth rather than doing the right thing, I sometimes worry. People think the USA has been here for ages and always will be, but people forget we are actually a very young country. The Aztec empire flourished for 2000 years until the Spanish conquistadors came over. We have only been here for a fraction of that time. Do I think the country is on the verge of a collapse? No.

I also don’t think being run by “ancient white men” is a bad thing. With age comes wisdom, correct?

Read full topic
item.source: Why is America run by ancient white men?
